meanings.definition: Characterized by sudden or unexpected changes in direction or intensity.
meanings.sent1: The storm's abruptest arrival caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent2: The abruptest turn in the story left the readers stunned.
meanings.sent3: The abruptest change in plans made us all laugh at the confusion.
meanings.sent4: His abruptest decision to quit his job was like a lightning strike.
meanings.sent5: The abruptest shift in temperature made us shiver uncontrollably.

meanings.definition: Happening or done quickly and without warning.
meanings.sent1: The abruptest stop of the car made us all jerk forward.
meanings.sent2: She made the abruptest decision to leave the party early.
meanings.sent3: The abruptest arrival of the pizza delivery guy surprised us all.
meanings.sent4: His abruptest departure from the meeting raised some eyebrows.
meanings.sent5: The abruptest change in music startled the audience.
